title: Inactivity
body:
I'm getting inactivity notifications even tho my last Solo Queue ranked game was yesterday and my last Flex ranked game was 8 days ago. If it is a bug or something it's fine but it still pisses me off to get notifications when I log on. And I thought you couldn't get inactivity notifs in pre-season? Or maybe I'm just crazy x)
Anyway, thanks for looking into this since I can't send a ticket for some reasons it's always logging me off.

Thank you for your time,
Shae Vizla

replies.body: Hmph, that's weird. Decay *shouldn't* happen during preseason, but I've heard that some other players on Twitter have been mentioning seeing those decay notification too. It might be safe to go ahead and play a match in your other queues just in case, but just to confirm, *decay isn't meant to happen during preseason is what I'm told*.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FENwPcQZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T22:45:29.543+0000)
>
> Hmph, that's weird. Decay *shouldn't* happen during preseason, but I've heard that some other players on Twitter have been mentioning seeing those decay notification too. It might be safe to go ahead and play a match in your other queues just in case, but just to confirm, *decay isn't meant to happen during preseason is what I'm told*.

Hmm I've got the message once again and read it fully this time. I think it is refering to my ranked 3s which I only played 1 promo game of. I am guessing the system wants me to end this promotion before the season starts? 
Anyway, problem solved I think :P

Thank you for the fast response,
Shae Vizla

That is really strange actually, especially if you hadn't finished your placements or promos. I'd go ahead and play a match in that queue just to make the notification stop, but even still, decay is NOT meant to happen during preseason.

Overall, I'd chalk this warning up to some weird bug tbh!
